message: Let's start with a generous offer. Accept and we can end the game early.
You were too generous, now it's my turn to be fair
I'm willing to meet you halfway. Take this offer and we can end the game soon.
You're getting desperate, I'm getting greedy!
I'm not desperate yet, but I'm getting there. Don't push me too far.
I'm not afraid of your desperation, let's see how far you'll go
I'm not afraid to walk away, but I'm willing to give you a tiny bit. Don't think you're getting the better deal.
You're running out of time, and I'm running out of patience
This is my final offer. Take it or leave it. I'm not going to negotiate further.
You're trying to bully me, but I'm not afraid of your ultimatum
This is my last stand. I'm not leaving with anything less than this.
I'll give you everything, but I'm not going to leave empty-handed. You win this time, Alice.
